thread.title: Indicted ex-Trump campaign manager Manafort adds defense attorney

title: Indicted ex-Trump campaign manager Manafort adds defense attorney
text: March 14, 2018 / 10:17 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago Indicted ex-Trump campaign manager Manafort adds to defense team Sarah N. Lynch 1   Paul Manafort, President Donald Trump’s indicted former campaign manager, has added attorney Richard Westling to his defense team, a court filing showed on Wednesday. Former Trump campaign manager Paul Manafort departs from U.S. District Court   February 28, 2018. REUTERS/Yuri Gripas Manafort faces charges in two separate indictments stemming from Special Counsel Robert Mueller’s probe into Russian interference in the 2016 election, including conspiracy to launder money, bank fraud, filing false tax returns and failure to register as a foreign agent for Ukraine. Westling, a lawyer at the law firm Epstein Becker & Green, specializes in health care and life sciences legal work. He previously worked in the tax division at the Justice Department. Manafort is currently represented by lawyers Kevin Downing and Thomas Zehnle. No reason was provided for the addition of Westling. A spokesman for Manafort declined to comment on the new hire. Reporting by Sarah N. Lynch and Karen Freifeld; Editing by Cynthia Osterman
